column5: Anyone interested in a free Fantasy football league? I'll run it if we can get enough guys on board. I am aiming for 16 teams. Shoot me a PM if you're interested.

The league has been set up, lots of spots still available.  Format is as follows:  1 QB 1 RB 2 WR 1TE 1 RB/WR/TE 1 K 1 TEAM D 2 DL 2 LB 2 DB 1 DL/LB/DB  Its a live online draft scheduled for Friday Aug 31 at 8 pm, this is right after pre-season but before opening night. Games are head to head. There will be 16 teams divided into 4 divisions with 4 division winners and 2 wildcards going to the playoffs based on wins/losses. Playoffs are weeks 15, 16 and 17.  If you have any questions feel free to PM me.
